Ai assist: Tooltip displayed when hovering over the CKEditor 5 icon, providing information about AI assistance.
Place holder: Hint suggesting users utilize AI for documenting or content creation.
Error processing command: Indicates a failure when processing the provided prompt.
Error readableStream not supported: Appears when the browser does not support readable streams.
Error stream locked: Appears when the returned stream is locked and cannot be accessed.
Error parsing response: Indicates an error when unable to parse the AI response stream.
Error fetch failed: Indicates a failure during a network call.
Error unsupported language: Appears when an unsupported language code is provided.
